attributes.action: To get rid of the valid date on theory pass certificates, if you pass ushouldn't have to retake it if it runs out.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I beileve that it is wrong that the theory test certificate only last's for two years and then you have to take it again, i think when you pass your theory thats it, it shouldn't run out its just another money making scheme to get money out of people.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Drivings/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
